page.title: 13Playgroup. Halls.
page.content: Playgroup. For the under-fives there is a play group held in Longwick. Fund raising events are held to help cover costs and the children enjoy puzzles, stories, music and movement etc. Village Hall The village hall is the hub of the village. Here is where most of the regular clubs are held: judo, keep fit, W.I., bingo, and the over 60's club. It is also used for Antique Fairs and other occasional happenings. The Scout Hall. This was recently built with the aid of a grant and much effort from the village and is the pride and joy of the local scout movement. It is in use most nights of the week for scouts, cubs, venture scouts, guides and brownies. Fund raising events for the scout movement are also held there
